docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 学习地址
docs.text:
• emacs 官网: https://www.gnu.org/software/emacs/
  • 专业 Emacs 入门: https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/385214753
  • emacs 插件工具: https://elpa.nongnu.org/

docs.title: 基本命令
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - 创建一个新项目
  • mkdocs serve - 本地启动 web 页面
  • mkdocs build - 编译生成静态页面
  • mkdocs gh-deploy --force - 部署到 git pages
